text: Va kasone, ki ʙa on ci Alloh taolo az fazli xeş ʙa onon dodaast, ʙuxl mevarzand, gumon nakunand, ki on [ʙuxl] ʙarojaşon xajr ast; ʙalki ʙarojaşon şar ast. Dar rūzi qijomat on ci ʙa on ʙuxl mevarzidand, tavqi gardanaşon xohad şud [va ʙo on azoʙ meşavand]; va merosi osmonhovu zamin az oni Alloh taolo ast va Alloh taolo ʙa on ci mekuned, ogoh ast
